args.natural_language_statement:
Give a conceptual derivation (i.e., a proof) of the addition formulas for sine and cosine: for all real θ1, θ2,
cos(θ1+θ2)=cos θ1 * cos θ2 - sin θ1 * sin θ2,
sin(θ1+θ2)=sin θ1 * cos θ2 + cos θ1 * sin θ2.
Translate into Lean4 (import Mathlib at top) and end each theorem with := by sorry (no full proof).

result:
{"ok": true, "lean_translation": "import Mathlib
open Real

/-- Give a conceptual derivation (i.e., a proof) of the addition formulas for sine and cosine: for all real θ1, θ2,
cos(θ1+θ2)=cos θ1 * cos θ2 - sin θ1 * sin θ2,
sin(θ1+θ2)=sin θ1 * cos θ2 + cos θ1 * sin θ2.
Translate into Lean4 (import Mathlib at top) and end each theorem with := by sorry (no full proof). -/
theorem cos_add_tac_14409 (θ₁ : ℝ) (θ₂ : ℝ) : cos (θ₁ + θ₂) = cos θ₁ * cos θ₂ - sin θ₁ * sin θ₂  :=  by sorry"}

args.content:
import Mathlib
open Real

/-- Addition formulas for cosine and sine. -/
theorem cos_add (θ₁ : ℝ) (θ₂ : ℝ) :
  cos (θ₁ + θ₂) = cos θ₁ * cos θ₂ - sin θ₁ * sin θ₂ := by sorry

/-- Addition formula for sine. -/
theorem sin_add (θ₁ : ℝ) (θ₂ : ℝ) :
  sin (θ₁ + θ₂) = sin θ₁ * cos θ₂ + cos θ₁ * sin θ₂ := by sorry
